so when the doj starts arresting the criminals they can say they're arresting journalists.

item.description: Inside your head is a thing called the subconscious that's primitive, has little understanding of the world. It mainly sees you, and projects all its memories on you. It's looking out through your eyes the same way you view the cosmos. WIth awe but little actual understanding.
item.source:markdown: Inside your head is a thing called the subconscious that's primitive, has little understanding of the world. It mainly sees you, and projects all its memories on you. It's looking out through your eyes the same way you view the cosmos. WIth awe but little actual understanding.
